title: ProActions AI-Kit Step Configuration Schema
description: A single step in a workflow. The 'step' property determines the type and schema to use.

IF.description: Execute a conditional branch based on a condition

condition.description: The condition to evaluate. Can be a template expression with {{ }} syntax.

test.description: Legacy alternative to condition. The condition to evaluate using JavaScript syntax.

then.description: Steps to execute if the condition is true

else.description: Steps to execute if the condition is false

SET.description: Set a variable in the flowContext. All properties not listed above are treated as key-value pairs to set in the flowContext.

text.description: Text value to set (can contain template expressions with {{ }} syntax)

expression.description: Legacy. JavaScript expression to evaluate and store the result

raw_text.description: Legacy. Raw text value to set without template processing

convertTo.description: Convert the value to the specified type

steps.description: Legacy. Steps to execute and use their result as the value

SWITCH.description: Execute different branches based on a value

condition.description: Template expression to evaluate for the switch

switch.description: Legacy alternative to condition. JavaScript expression to evaluate for the switch

oneOf.description: Map of case values to steps. This is the preferred format.
Legacy format. Array of case objects with test and do properties

test.description: Case value or 'default' for the default case

do.description: Steps to execute for this case

cases.description: Case definitions for the switch statement

WHILE.description: Executes steps repeatedly while a condition is true

condition.description: Template expression to evaluate for the loop condition

test.description: Legacy alternative to condition. JavaScript expression to evaluate for the loop condition

do.description: Steps to execute in each iteration of the loop

template.description: Name of the template to call

name.description: Alternative property to specify the template name

template.description: JavaScript template string to compile and execute

id.description: Optional identifier for this debug step

omitDebugger.description: If true, the debugger statement will not be executed

SLEEP.description: Pause execution for a specified time

PROMPT.description: Prompt the user for text input

promptText.description: Text to display in the prompt dialog

USER_SELECT.description: Prompt the user to select from a list of options

promptText.description: Text to display in the selection dialog

FILE_UPLOAD.description: Prompt the user to upload a file

promptText.description: Text to display in the upload dialog

accept.description: MIME types or file extensions to accept (e.g., '.jpg,.png,.pdf')

fileTypes.description: Array of MIME types to accept

outputs.description: Output parameters from this step. By default, uploaded file will be stored in 'file' property of flowContext.

HUB_COMPLETION.description: Generate text using the AI Hub completion API

instruction.description: User prompt for the AI request. Supports template expressions with {{ }} syntax.

behavior.description: System prompt that defines the AI's behavior

service.description: Service name to use (references a service from SERVICES section)

replaceXmlLang.description: Replace xml:lang attribute with this value

service.description: Service name to use (references a service from SERVICES section)

DEEPL_WRITE.description: Improve text using DeepL Write (rephrase, grammatical corrections, etc.)

instruction.description: Text content to improve or rephrase

tone.description: Tone preference for the rephrased text

service.description: Service name to use (references a service from SERVICES section)

REST.description: Make an HTTP request to a REST API

body.description: Request body for POST, PUT, etc.

formData.description: Request form data for POST, PUT, etc.

parameters.description: URL parameters to append to the request

outputs.description: Output parameters from this step. By default, response text will be stored in 'text' property of flowContext.

at.description: Position reference for where to get content. If not specified, reads full document text.
Position reference for where to get content. If not specified, reads full document XML.

REPLACE_TEXT.description: Replace text at a specific position

at.description: Position reference for where to replace

in.description: Content to insert (with template expression support using {{ }} syntax)

forceWrite.description: Whether to force writing even in read-only mode

REPLACE_XML.description: Replace XML at a specific position

at.description: Position reference for where to replace

in.description: XML content to replace with (with template support)

forceWrite.description: Whether to force writing even in read-only mode

INSERT_TEXT.description: Insert text at a specific position

at.description: Position reference for where to insert

forceWrite.description: Whether to force writing even in read-only mode

INSERT_XML.description: Insert XML at a specific position

at.description: Position reference for where to insert

in.description: Content to insert (with template expression support)

position.description: How to position the XML relative to the target

forceWrite.description: Whether to force writing even in read-only mode

INSERT_LIST.description: Insert a list at a specific position

at.description: Position reference for where to insert

omitContainer.description: Whether to omit the container element

position.description: How to position the list relative to the target

SHOW_RESPONSE.description: Show a response modal to the user

SHOW_NOTIFICATION.description: Show a notification to the user

TO_LIST.description: Convert text to a list. The text from the flowContext.text will be processed and the result will be stored in flowContext.list.

MARKDOWN_TO_HTML.description: Convert Markdown text to HTML. The text from the flowContext.text will be processed and the result will be stored in flowContext.text.

PARSE_JSON.description: Parse JSON text to an object. The text from the flowContext.text will be processed and the result will be stored in flowContext.object.

cursorPosition.description: Where to place the cursor after clearing the selection

WRITE_CLIPBOARD.description: Write data to the user's clipboard. The text from the flowContext.text will be written to the clipboard.

READ_CLIPBOARD.description: Read data from the user's clipboard and store it in flowContext.text.

autoHide.description: Whether to automatically hide the progress bar

SELECTED_OBJECT.description: Get information about currently selected object. By default, stores object ID in flowContext.text.

SET_METADATA.description: Set metadata in the object panel

selector.description: CSS selector for the target input element

DOWNLOAD.description: Download a file to the user's device. Uses text from flowContext.text or blob from flowContext.blob as the content.
